name: VR Mars Walk
description:
VR Mars Walk Cardboard 3D game provides you to discover how to walk on the Mars, plus complete a rocket launch mission while you escape from the Martian aliens.

The virtual reality graphics are very nice. Walk nearby the craters, explore the rocky & soil terrain, feel the red terrain of the Mars.

How to play:
It is very easy. Just stare at where you want to go.
Activate / deactivate rocket, solar panel by just looking at them
Kill aliens by targeting them

Please vote for our virtual reality cardboard app so that we will be adding more exciting VR apps and develop it better.
